title: Magic in Windowland
description: Doodle Pip is thrilled when an accidental act of magic brings him to life on little Nina's living room window. But it doesn't take him long to realise that he's out there, all alone. Can Pip find friends in this new world? Or is he doomed to face the perils of Windowland all on his own?
author: Rupamanjari Majumder
